name: Finding Home (DevUsTeam)
description:
This is a project of five 2nd-Semester -Students of the Macromedia University.

We've created this game not only as a Project, but also as a passion for game making. 

In "Finding Home" you help Snecko, the little Snake-Gecko-Hybrid to find his way through a moist and squishy cave back to his family. You will meet characters like Raddy, Birb or Daddy Long Legs on your Journey :D

So be ready to play the best and cutest game of the year! (Cyberpunk was yesterday, "Finding Home" is the future!)

And always remember: every Snecko needs a friend!

-The Team of DevUs
